channel.title: How do I add item/coord/npc id display?
channel.description:
I am trying to find a way so that when I right click items and npcs it shows me their id.
I am also trying to found out a way to make it so in the bottom right of the screen it shows me my current x & y coords.
all help is appreciated.

item.title: How do I add item/coord/npc id display?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

There are item and npc id lists in the MoparScape client. You can also find them in other places. Some clients also allow you to see the npcâ€™s ID by right-clicking by default.

Are you using the MoparScape client?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add item/coord/npc id display?
